entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sainte-Agathe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.2°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
